Border radius
Border radius
Border radius
Border radius
Box shadow
Word wrapping format
Maginification of current element
MS Internet Explorer filter
Color of an element's text
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit Aqua Black Blue Fuchsia Gray Green Lime Maroon Navy Olive Orange Purple Red Silver Teal White Yellow ActiveBorder ActiveCaption AppWorkspace Background ButtonFace ButtonHighlight ButtonShadow ButtonText CaptionText GrayText Highlight HighlightText InactiveBorder InactiveCaption InactiveCaptionText InfoBackground InfoText Menu MenuText Scrollbar ThreeDDarkShadow ThreeDFace ThreeDHighlight ThreeDLighShadow ThreeDShadow Window WindowFrame WindowText

cssmd:property-def.description: Font used for an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: one of the system fonts | [font-style] [font-variant] [font-weight] [font-size]/[line-height] [font-family] | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Name of the font used for an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: A font face name sequence | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Style of the font used for an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the font-style values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Variant of the font used for an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the font-variant values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Size of the font used for an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: length | percentage | standard font size value | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit large larger medium small smaller x-large x-small xx-large xx-small

cssmd:property-def.description: Boldness of the font used for an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the font-weight values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Decorations applied to font used for an element's text
Dynamic outline around visual objects
Width of the outline
cssmd:property-def.syntax: a unit | One of the border-width values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Style of the outline
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the border-style values except hidden | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: dashed dotted double groove hidden inset none outset ridge solid inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The color of the outline
cssmd:property-def.enum: invert inherit Aqua Black Blue Fuchsia Gray Green Lime Maroon Navy Olive Orange Purple Red Silver Teal White Yellow ActiveBorder ActiveCaption AppWorkspace Background ButtonFace ButtonHighlight ButtonShadow ButtonText CaptionText GrayText Highlight HighlightText InactiveBorder InactiveCaption InactiveCaptionText InfoBackground InfoText Menu MenuText Scrollbar ThreeDDarkShadow ThreeDFace ThreeDHighlight ThreeDLighShadow ThreeDShadow Window WindowFrame WindowText

cssmd:property-def.description: Background of an element
Color used for an element's background
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit transparent Aqua Black Blue Fuchsia Gray Green Lime Maroon Navy Olive Orange Purple Red Silver Teal White Yellow ActiveBorder ActiveCaption AppWorkspace Background ButtonFace ButtonHighlight ButtonShadow ButtonText CaptionText GrayText Highlight HighlightText InactiveBorder InactiveCaption InactiveCaptionText InfoBackground InfoText Menu MenuText Scrollbar ThreeDDarkShadow ThreeDFace ThreeDHighlight ThreeDLighShadow ThreeDShadow Window WindowFrame WindowText

cssmd:property-def.description: Image used for an element's background
How the background image is attached to an element within the document
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the background-attachment values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: How the background image is tiled within an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the background-repeat values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: How the background is positioned within an element
cssmd:property-def.enum: bottom center left right top inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The horizontal alignment of an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the text-align values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The vertical alignment of an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the vertical-align values | a unit | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: baseline bottom inherit middle sub super text-bottom text-top top

cssmd:property-def.description: The spacing between characters | inherit
The spacing between lines
The indentation of text
Letter case of the text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the text-transform values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The spacing between words
A value that indicates whether lines are automatically broken inside the object
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the white-space values | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit normal nowrap pre pre-line pre-wrap

cssmd:property-def.description: The shadow of an element's text
The display mode of an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the display values | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: block inherit inline inline-block inline-table list-item none run-in table table-caption table-cell table-column table-column-group table-row table-row-group table-footer-group table-header-group

cssmd:property-def.description: Edge of the object on which text will flow
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the float values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Sides on which floating objects will not be allowed
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the clear values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The visibility of an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the visibility values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The positioning mode of an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the position values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The stacking order of a positioned element
The left edge of a positioned element
The right edge of a positioned element
The top edge of a positioned element
The bottom edge of a positioned element
Visibility of content extending beyond element's dimensions
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the overflow values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The clipping rectangle of an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: rect([top unit] [right unit] [bottom unit] [left unit]) | auto | inherit

Constrains box width
The height of a positioned element
Constrains box height
Constrains box height
Specifies horizontal offset between a marker box and the associated principal box

cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the border-style values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the border-style values | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit dashed dotted double groove hidden inset none outset ridge solid

cssmd:property-def.description: The color of the border on the right edge of an element

cssmd:property-def.description: The style of the border on the right edge of an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the border-style values | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit dashed dotted double groove hidden inset none outset ridge solid

cssmd:property-def.description: The color of the border on the top edge of an element
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit transparent Aqua Black Blue Fuchsia Gray Green Lime Maroon Navy Olive Orange Purple Red Silver Teal White Yellow ActiveBorder ActiveCaption AppWorkspace Background ButtonFace ButtonHighlight ButtonShadow ButtonText CaptionText GrayText Highlight HighlightText InactiveBorder InactiveCaption InactiveCaptionText InfoBackground InfoText Menu MenuText Scrollbar ThreeDDarkShadow ThreeDFace ThreeDHighlight ThreeDLighShadow ThreeDShadow Window WindowFrame WindowText

cssmd:property-def.description: The width of the border on the top edge of an element

cssmd:property-def.description: The style of the border on the top edge of an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the border-style values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The width of the border on the bottom edge of an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: a unit | One of the border-width values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The style of the border on the bottom edge of an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the border-style values | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit dashed dotted double groove hidden inset none outset ridge solid

cssmd:property-def.description: Location of the font file
Page breaks before an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the page-break-before values | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit always auto avoid left right

cssmd:property-def.description: Page breaks after an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the page-break-after values | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit always auto avoid left right

cssmd:property-def.description: Page breaks inside an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the page-break-inside values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Minimum number of lines of a paragraph to leave at the bottom of a page
Minimum number of lines of a paragraph to leave at the top of a page
Median volume of the waveform
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the volume values or any number between 0 and 100 or percentage of the inherited value
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit loud medium silent soft x-loud x-soft

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies whether text will be rendered aurally and in what manner
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the speak values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies a pause before speaking an element content
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Time in milliseconds or percentage of the value of the speech-rate property | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies a pause after speaking an element content
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Time in milliseconds or percentage of the value of the speech-rate property | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies a pause before and/or after speaking an element content
Auditory icon
cssmd:property-def.syntax: none | url([url to cue image]) | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Auditory icon
cssmd:property-def.syntax: none | url([url to cue image]) | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Auditory icons
Sound to be played as a background while an element's content is spoken
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the play-during values or url to the sound file | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Spatial information
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the azimuth values or angle in -360 to 360 degrees range | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit behind center center-left center-right far-left far-right left left-side leftwards right right-side rightwards

cssmd:property-def.description: Spatial information
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the azimuth values or angle in -90 to 90 degrees range | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit above below higher level lower

cssmd:property-def.description: Speaking rate
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the speech-rate values or integer value in words per minute | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit fast faster medium slow slower x-fast x-slow

cssmd:property-def.description: Voice family
cssmd:property-def.syntax: List of comma-separated, prioritized list of voice family names | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Average pitch (a frequency) of the speaking voice
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the pitch values or frequency in hertz | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit high low medium x-high x-low

cssmd:property-def.description: Variation in average pitch
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Value between 0 and 100 | inherit. 50 produces normal inflection.

cssmd:property-def.description: Height of local peaks in the intonation contour of a voice
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Value between 0 and 100 | inherit. 50 is a standard English-speaking male voice.

cssmd:property-def.description: Richness, or brightness, of the speaking voice
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Value between 0 and 100 | inherit. Lower values produce softer voice.

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies how puctuation is spoken
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the speak-punctuation values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies how numerals are spoken
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the speak-numeral values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The bullet characteristics of a list item
The bullet style of a list item
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the list-style-type values | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit armenian circle cjk-ideographic decimal decimal-leading-zero disc georgian hebrew hiragana hiragana-iroha katakana katakana-iroha lower-alpha lower-greek lower-latin lower-roman none square upper-alpha upper-latin upper-roman

cssmd:property-def.description: The bullet image of a list item
cssmd:property-def.syntax: none | url([url to bullet image]) | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The bullet position of a list item
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the list-style-position values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Indicates how much the counter is incremented for every occurence of the element
Defines the value that the counter is set to on each occurence of the element
Used with the :before and :after pseudo-elements to generate content in a document
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Text content | counter | quote values | attr(X) | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit close-quote no-close-quote no-open-quote normal open-quote

cssmd:property-def.description: Quotation marks for any number of embedded quotations
The direction that text flows in
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the direction values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The level of embedding with respect to the bidirectional algorithm
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the unicode-bidi values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The cell layout mode of a table
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the table-layout values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The table border model
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the border-collapse values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Distance that separates adjacent cell borders
Position of the caption box with respect to the table box
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the caption-side values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Controls rendering of borders around empty cells
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the empty-cells values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies whether table headers are spoken and how
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the speak-header values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The cursor over an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the cursor values | url([url to the cursor resource]) | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit auto crosshair default e-resize help move n-resize ne-resize nw-resize pointer progress s-resize se-resize sw-resize text w-resize wait
